Hold the storage facility responsible. You hold us responsible.

************** SCAMMERS  **************Avoid placing your trust in this inadequate business or its associated individuals. They engage in widespread scams, unabashedly going to sleep with clear consciences after preying on people. The units they auction often consist of leftovers, not items lost by others, as they prioritize personal gains. Bidder payments essentially fund the cleanup of the aftermath of their self-serving actions. Upon winning my first unit bid, filled mostly with empty boxes and odds and ends, I brushed it off as bad luck. However, my recent winning bid of over $300 for the largest 10x30 unit at this storage facility revealed an identical scenario—empty boxes, odds and ends, stained clothes, and heaps of trash. Considering the monthly cost and deposit for a 10x30, it's perplexing that there wasn't a single valuable item. Why would anybody invest such a substantial amount of money on a monthly basis to store nothing more than discarded items ?In either case, I'm in the initial stages of filing a police report and submitting a complaint to the Better Business Bureau.Best of luck to all.

Storage Treasures allows unit owners to fraudulently stage then default on their unit rental, bid up the unit’s auction and score big profits. Treasures of course makes makes way more money allowing this to happen. No remedy for the scammed auction buyer. Happens a lot.My reaction to Storage Treasures reply? …misdirection hogwash by blaming the Extra Storage company, typical of a company involved in a very shady long term con.Law enforcement is interested.

Monster box was empty and resealed, every box was completely empty except for two boxes that were full of trash that was swept up from other units with other peoples names on them, which i found out those people had units auctioned off previously as well. Buyers beware, stay away from this storage facility...

One was an announcement that I won a unit and what steps had to be followed and the second email was a receipt for the amount of money charged to my account and showing it was paid. I received no further information until I appeared in person in the office on Monday, October 30th. At this point she referred to an email she sent, at 11:17, telling me the unit was canceled. Review.Titre: Storage facility management acts put-out as if I am a burden for winning their auction
Review.Contenu: Title says it all. I called to schedule pick-up an hour before the facility closed and nobody picked up the phone. I was an hour away from home and this facility was only 5-10 minutes from another facility that I had just cleaned out. The next day, management calls me and I schedule to meet them at 10:00. I know I'm going to miss 10:00, so I call them at 9:30 and reschedule for 12:00. It's one of those days, so I am a little over halfway there and it's 12:20 and management calls me and tells me that if I'm not there by 12:30 then they're going to give the unit to the next highest bidder. The manager's tone made me feel like a burden. Like she didn't want to help me get what I'd paid for, but would if everything lined up perfectly (and I do wish my life would allow that). Funny how her store can stop answering the phone an hour early (and thus cost me 3 hours of driving) no problem, but God save us all if I am 31 minutes late to where she's already going to be. So I turned around, knowing I would be at least 10-15m later than 12:30, and not wanting to deal with this lady's tone nor attitude in person. She made an offer to the next highest bidder, and she got StorageTreasures to ban my account.

Review.Titre: Customer Support Disaster
Review.Contenu: For months, this website worked great, but lately I've had several gross interactions with their customer support team that have left me no longer interested in using the platform. There was an issue where a facility was unexpectedly closed on the day I had scheduled to clean out a unit and the facility did not give me any extra time to finish. That same facility actually had the audacity to report my account and have it suspended and the Storage Treasures customer support sided with the facility. Once I finally had my account reactivated, the customer support had told me that I was not allowed to bid at that specific facility again. After that, I won an auction at a different facility that belonged to the same company and they permanently suspended my account claiming that I was banned from all facilities belonging to that company. I reached out to customer support with the email proof that this was incorrect and again was not helped by them at all. It's a shame that this company is so willing to completely ruin someone's livelihood over false pretenses.

Review.Contenu: I hate the fact that the at the facility unit gets to go through the units before taking pictures. five out of three are always gone through by the facility employees. storage treasures wont do anything about it or they don't do anything about it. it's like they just  don't care.

Review.Titre: I purchased 3 units and all three had…
Review.Contenu: I purchased 3 units and all three had already been gone thru by someone who had already removed? One had a cash register that had been forcefully opened and another every box had been opened and half emptied looking thru the contents

Review.Titre: The facility and the employees were absolutely fantastic.
Review.Contenu: The facility and the employees were terrific in understanding our problem. The listing was listed as 10x10. However, the size of the locker was 10x20, which is more than we would bid on. The staff was extremely gracious in helping us resolve this situation, but the ad was definitely misleading.

Review.Titre: I’ve had three auctions cancel in the…
Review.Contenu: I’ve had three auctions cancel in the middle or almost end of the auction. Waste of time and energy. Also having 72 hours to clean up when it takes 24 just to get ahold of most storage facilities to get a key an code is terrible

Review.Titre: Some of the storage companies…
Review.Contenu: Some of the storage companies completely Ransack the lockers it’s quite evident in the photos and in the lockers! This is in no way the fault of storage treasures who seems to be trying to run a legit business! Although some unscrupulous individuals are willing to cheat the system! Buyer beware!

Review.Titre: Well that was quick
Review.Contenu: I lasted one unit before being banned.  I bid on a 10x10 that was stacked to the wall with stuff I didn't want but I bid in hopes of a gaming chair and leaving.  Don't make my mistake and bid on an item when you can't spend the $500 worth of time and effort removing the rest of the junk.  One strike and you may be out... we'll see what they decide on that "Manager Special" test unit I refused to pay to clear.

Review.Titre: I waited over 2 hours to get in to a…
Review.Contenu: I waited over 2 hours to get in to a storage locker I purchased on line.I get down there and there’s a sign to go to theLongwood office in which I waited 1hour on the lady and then was told to meet her back at the original locker place in which I waited another 1 he 15 mins for her to come open the locker.I was not the only one waiting.Itcwas hot and this was ridiculous.They also couldn’t find my invoice.Totally mismanaged!

Review.Titre: Owners of storage shed show up
Review.Contenu: Although storage treasures was a great bid from your computer experience I just want people to know that when I was loading my won storage shed the owner and family of the shed walked up and confronted me telling me they want Thier personal belongings back.. They just happen to come in emptying another shed out that they owned the day I was clearing out the one they lost.. on top of it they were drug users wich made me feel super unsafe about a bad confrontation..

Review.Titre: The website is terrible
Review.Contenu: The website is terrible, really needs some updates regarding how slow it moves through the pages. Also, customer service is absolutely horrendous. I’ve been using storage auctions.com since they are amazingly better (website and customer service).

Review.Titre: Extremely misleading and stressful situation.
Review.Contenu: I was overcharged by the facility.  They charged me the $36 fee that Storage Treasures also charged me. When I called to have it refunded, they “didn’t know how.”  Also, the “48” hours I had to clean out the unit was actually 17 if I was unemployed, as I could only clean it out during business hours 9:30-6:00.  And since I work a normal 8-5, I was only given 2 hours.  That is far from 48.Also, the $100 deposit was expected to be in cash, although that was not labeled anywhere.An EXTREMELY unprofessional and stressful situation all around.

Review.Titre: I think that if a unit is up for…
Review.Contenu: I think that if a unit is up for auction that the owner should not be able to come in and pay off. I think that if they want their unit back that they all they should be entitled to bid along with the rest of us because sometimes we feel like we’re wasting our time there’s been multiple time is it the same unit has came up more than once I personally have wasted a lot of time checking my bids, making sure everything was right and at the very very end within the last few hours the auction gets canceled that’s why anymore when I see a unit this came up more than once. I don’t waste my time no more.

Review.Titre: Won an auction and was cancelled…
Review.Contenu: Won an auction and was cancelled following day.

Review.Titre: 2 stars.because I recently had a…
Review.Contenu: 2 stars.because I recently had a storage steal several toolboxes out of the storage I bought.the police were called and a report was made.then they tried to have me removed because I confronted them about it.and even though I cleaned the storage unit out and they gave me back my cleaning deposit they call and reported that I didn't clean it out out of spite.if I didn't clean the storage out then they would have kept the free $100 deposit.but they gave it back because it was clean.but storage treasures still suspended my account and still allowed them to continue selling storage and suspended me instead.clearly y'all support the stealing and bad business.customer service should be a priority.especially when they have been wrong but clearly y'all don't care

Review.Titre: When I call with a legitimate problem…
Review.Contenu: When I call with a legitimate problem your team should be able to resolve the issue. Instead they say all well this is the way it is., I asked to speak to a manager and they said they would pass on my phone number. Manager never called! Very poor way to run a business., now I get an email to review my experience?? Poor performance!! None actually, never took care of the unit I won., manager never followed up. Just enough for me to have a bad feeling about your company. I’m

Review.Titre: Deception from StorageTreasures and Public Storage!!! Not at all what you expect!
Review.Contenu: We've won auctions on this site not for the first time, and not for the first time we encounter deceit! Upon arriving at the unit in Public Storage, we find that the arrangement of items doesn't match the auction photos at all! Someone completely went through them and took what they wanted.We declined the auction and heard from the manager that they will take new photos and put the storage up for auction again!! How is this even possible? It's deception! All items have been rifled through and the most valuable things taken!We contacted StorageTreasures customer support and informed them about this situation. They replied that they won't do anything about it and will allow the same storage to be auctioned again.Based on this, buyers are completely deceived and the whole point of this 'game' is lost. How can you continue when you know everything has already been rummaged through before you? Very disappointed in the deceit from Public Storage and StorageTreasures!!!If this issue is not resolved soon and we are not contacted by a StorageTreasures manager, we intend to publicize this incident on social media platforms such as TikTok, Facebook, and YouTube. Everyone should be aware of this so as not to fall into the trap.

Review.Titre: So far not impressed with the process
Review.Contenu: I won a unit quite far away from me.i contacted the storage facility they said everything was a go. I drove over 50 miles which was about half way and they called and cancelled. They said my money would be refunded but it had not I'm currently waiting. I had to contact storage treasures to file a complaint. So far not a good experience.

Review.Titre: Pictures didn’t not accurately show…
Review.Contenu: Pictures did not accurately show contents compared to being there. They must show more pictures of the mattresses and furniture and other less desirable items as well as the valuable items.

Review.Titre: Suggested Improvements
Review.Contenu: Too many auctions are shill bid to ridiculous numbers and then cancelled. Considering the prices these units go for, a 10-15% buyers premium is obnoxiously high, especially when you're not protecting auctions from poor bidding practices. I would suggest finding a way to monitor the bidding habits of accounts and IP banning those that are bidding up auctions and not buying or buying and not paying. While I understand this practice makes you more money and not taking action against it benefits you, I likely won't continue to look at auctions here if it continues.Pictures are often grainy and out of focus. There should be a review process to clean this up. In the age of smart phones with 5 cameras we shouldn't be looking at world War 2 era motion photos of a storage unit. Bidding and browsing feel chaotic and unprofessional for the above reasons. Things need to be more monitored and controlled. Especially for the prices being paid and the amount of premium being charged.

Review.Titre: sale listed items that simply were not …
Review.Contenu: sale listed items that simply were not  there!   Absolutely no motorcycles in a unit that could've easily been seen if it had been there.   Also bought a unit number that had the wrong unit number.     a little suspicious with a unit that when opened only had 1 item when opened.    Very Disappointing!

Review.Titre: Auctions are BS
Review.Contenu: An A.I. runs this app. Always outbidding us no matter the price could be $1000 and it'll go up another $10 no matter what.

Review.Titre: They do not convey credibility at work
Review.Contenu: They do not convey credibility at work. It is a stroke of luck. Three times they canceled the auction when I had a high bid. The most absurd thing was canceling after I had already won the lot. 30 minutes later, they told me it was cancelled. Ultimately, they choose who wins or not. It could be their day or it could be they don't want it to be.

Review.Titre: Scam
Review.Contenu: The storage I won had a safe in it, but the rest of the storage was full of nothing but junk and trash.  The safe was brand new and not even dusty the way the rest of the storage was.  Everything was dusty and full of cobwebs except the safe.  Given the condition of the storage vs. The   safe, I hate to say it but the safe was put there just so someone would clean that storage unit.  I spent 3 days cleaning a nasty storage unit, and then when I was done the people were out of town on the day they told me to be done in order to get my deposit back.  I still haven't gotten my deposit back and I live out of town like 45 miles away and the people won't do PayPal or Cash App or anything.  Now I have to make another trip because they chose to be out of town on a day they also scheduled my time to be done cleaning the unit in order to get my deposit.  Every time I speak to the woman who works at the storage sight she's rude and not very pleasant.  Next time they need to hire some junk removal company instead of scamming people.

Review.Titre: A majority of Storage Facilities…
Review.Contenu: A majority of Storage Facilities rummage through lockers once pictures on posted on your sight. And when reported nothing happens, you told to just move on. Complete waste of ones time.

Review.Titre: Not impressed at all
Review.Contenu: The online auction is a great ideaThe restarting of the clock if someone bids within 3 mins is nothing but a scam and blatant gouging. I’ve spoke to multiple auction houses and like myself .., they were baffled and appalled

Review.Titre: No property manager - sold my unit
Review.Contenu: The auction process itself was a breeze. Easy to use customer friendly website and instructions. A few hours away from the deadline for emptying the unit, I couldn’t reach the property so I went to the facility. I arrived at a different public storage about 3/4 mile up the road and the helpful lady advised me that I wouldn’t be in default because nobody is actually at that property today and that’s why I didn’t get an answer or reply. She was nice enough to send an email that indicated I was still entitled to the unit on account of their lack of availability. The next day, I stayed in touch with this gentleman all day long and immediately after I hung up the phone with him telling him I would be there in 15 minutes he sold my unit to someone else. I arrived and he was gone in the wind and someone else was emptying my unit into their vehicle. This was such a huge waste of my time to have gone out there two days in a row and not even a email notification that they sold my unit. Not a good first experience at all.

Review.Titre: It is my 3rd time that I win an auction…
Review.Contenu: It is my 3rd time that I win an auction and when boy is there a problem and it does not exist.  I'm still waiting for my money back.  because they charge me 16 dollars without giving me my won auction.  They told me that the owner of the storage room paid at the last minute.  I think they should take action with that detail because I spend my gasoline, my time, and my rented car to pick it up.  And when I am a boy, the owner already pays.

Review.Titre: U guys where great
Review.Contenu: U guys where great . My bad not knowing what a private seller was. Never again

Review.Titre: Terrible mobile service and staged units
Review.Contenu: Terrible mobile connectivity. Always resetting when using the site. Logging out of account randomly. Almost unusable. Let’s certain storage facilities stage/go through units over and over without consequences, leaving the buyer with straight garbage

Review.Titre: Unprofessional
Review.Contenu: They don't give the full insight of they take cash or credit card and they don't give us as a consumer notice whether they open on  Sunday or for pickup this cost me money and time on three different occasions.

Review.Titre: Customer service
Review.Contenu: Do you win an auction by the time you get there took it off I feel that Least could do is call you and let you know that has been taken off the auction block and not wait till you get there and find out that somebody has already come to empty it out for most people time is money expenses are dragging the trailer all the way there is expensive and they don’t even have the decency to say I’m sorry

Review.Titre: Selling units that shouldn't be sold
Review.Contenu: Selling units that shouldn't be sold, then banning me for not accepting my payment, one unit you was not even suppose to sell. Totally disgusted now I ban you!

Review.Titre: website is slow
Review.Contenu: website is slow, has glitches, for instance web pages freeze very very frequently and I have to refresh .  That's all info you get for free.

Review.Titre: Every time you hit the back arrow to go…
Review.Contenu: Every time you hit the back arrow to go to the previous screen, you have to start all over to see your auctions. It’s bull crap and frustrating wasting all that time over a website issue.

Review.Titre: Confusing service with storage unit property
Review.Contenu: Couldn't reach property and still haven't been able to paid for storage unit I won bid for, once reached property they said they needed invoice and 3rd day later and they have not allowed me to receive and purchase storage unit yet

Review.Titre: Brought two units at Redford storage…
Review.Contenu: Brought two units at Redford storage unit. They weren't as pictured. Again last week,  This also happens 6 months ago.  The electronic and tools were gone. And air Jordan shoes. Reason of bidding.

Review.Titre: I didn’t get a gate code or…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t get a gate code or instructions for getting in my storage.By phone I only could get a number of the storage. And was waiting near your office while your employees came back

Review.Titre: 2X CANCELATION
Review.Contenu: The seller was rushing me to pick up and clean the unit. I still had 47 1/2 hrs left. This is the 2nd time I've been canceled. Different sellers each time. I read the small print and understand it. Maybe give 12 hours to pick up and clean up the unit, to give us buyers a sense of urgency. The employee at Extra Space @ 6301 W Mississippi  Lakewood Colorado told me I should be done very soon, because of the size of the unit. I have to rent a truck and coordinate with my work schedule. 72 hour after the end of the bid is comfortable for folks like me.             Henry G. Hoadley

Review.Titre: The worst experience with cardinal…
Review.Contenu: The worst experience with cardinal storage , and several times I have got storage that don’t look like in the pictures. When I call storage treasures I don’t get a response

Review.Titre: I was given an open offer opportunity…
Review.Contenu: I was given an open offer opportunity (Auction unit 2922558).  I received it late in the day on a weekend and had questions.  I first checked the frequently asked questions, but my issue was not present on that page.  I sent the following email:    I received an open offer 526425 for a unit on which I was backup bidder.  Before I answer the bid offer, I need to know the basis on which the winning bidder did not clean out the unit.In short, I need to know the unit was not entered and is still as pictured in the auction.  If this is the case, I will accept the offer.  If the winning bidder entered into the unit, I will choose to not accept.Please advise.Due to no one being available, the offer lapsed.  I never did receive a reply on the email.  I would definitely have purchased the unit if it were available.  I was quite disappointed, especially given the lack of response and availability with the timing of the offer.

Review.Titre: Lake Michigan Self Storage in Allendale…
Review.Contenu: Lake Michigan Self Storage in Allendale  Won this auction 12/13, on 12/14 I drove 45minutes w/2 truck/helpers, but was supposed to make an appointment. I urged them to please send an attendant over to remove lock or allow me to do it since it was paid-in-full already but accomodating my request seemed impossible.  I called the 15th to see if I could come on the 16th(the deadline for cleanout) and the lady said she was much too busy and that wouldn't be possible, so I picked it up on the 19th(convenient for them) but a snowy/cold day for me. She didn't take a cleaning deposit, because they run on the honor system, aka, too much work to get it back to me after it's cleaned out. They need to hire someone more local to the facility to better service their customer's needs. The parking lot was a thick sheet of ice as well.

Review.Titre: The pictures were deceiving and only…
Review.Contenu: The pictures were deceiving and only appeared to show one unit not 2.  Hid the 5 mattresses from pic that was clearly viewable when I arrived.  Had to pay $75 to dispose of the nasty mattresses.

Review.Titre: I bid and won an auction but it cancelled
Review.Contenu: I bid and won an auction. Then the auction got canceled so I really didn't win. Storage Treasures still took $2.50 out of my account even though the auction was canceled.

Review.Titre: the storage sold  me was 100% trash
Review.Contenu: the storage sold  to me was 100% trash, nothing to take home. when i complain and submitted the photos no one seem to care instead i was told i cant bid anymore for 30 days.

Review.Titre: I was sent an email about an OPEN OFFER…
Review.Contenu: I was sent an email about an OPEN OFFER for a free unit I seen a couple of days ago that didn't sell. I accepted the offer, I received the invoice, I drove 45 minutes one way to the facility, and they told me there was some kind of mistake. They said storage treasure should never have offered u the unit. They also said they haven't even cut the lock, which was a lie, because there were pictures of the unit contents on the web site. I brought that to their attention and the reply I received was " True That ". Now I am just wondering who screwed me out of 1 ½ hours of driving time, Storage treasures or Life Storage!

Review.Titre: Please don't over bid causing auction to be cancelled
Review.Contenu: I wish Storage Treasures could recognize some bidders who are taking advantage of the site. And over bidding on units. To where Storage Treasures has to cancel an auction. It could be the facility in fault. But it has been an on going issue with the same bidder causing the same unit to go unusually high. Then cancelled for unusual reasons. Friends an especially family members and the owner should be banned from bidding on there own storage unit. Also the storage facility should have new pictures each time an auction is up to bid on. Storage Treasures please follow up on this. One storage unit has been up to bid on and no new pictures are taken in Eugene or Springfield, Oregon

Review.Titre: I won an auction a week ago on Sunday
Review.Contenu: I won an auction a week ago on Sunday, went to pick up my winnings on Monday, before I went I called the office but no one answered the phone, I decided to drive 70 miles anyway and what do you think? upon arrival, I discovered that the warehouse and office were closed that day, this was written on a piece of paper at the door, but neither on the website nor on Google maps was anything written about a non-working day. in the end, I spent my legal one day out of three, money on renting a truck + gas there and back

Review.Titre: Poor Picture Quality
Review.Contenu: The biggest issue is if online is the only way buying units is going to be (which sucks) pictures are going to need to be a lot better. There’s no reason why with today’s phones they can’t be better.

Review.Titre: I always have issues with moving from…
Review.Contenu: I always have issues with moving from on id to another. The pictures don't follow they stay stuck on the previous auction unless I hit the refresh button. I also hate the second verification on the same device. I should be able to trust my devices so that I don't have too.Better pictures would also help.

Review.Titre: Do better
Review.Contenu: Convenient without having to show up in person bidding, but dang yall need to fix the issues with canceling auctions after the buyer wins, I have wasted time and fuel travelling only to be told its cancelled. When you buy pods on storagetreasures.com they take immediate payment , locks in the sale. Figure something out.

Review.Titre: I was super upset that I won the…
Review.Contenu: I was super upset that I won the locker, drove to the storage place and found out that the locker had been paid for by the owner but the assistant manager didn't know how to end the auction. I wasn't notified until I actually showed up to remove items from the locker that I thought I had won. I did get all my money back which was fine but was out the gas money to make the trip to the storage unit itself.

Review.Titre: Hey dont always have the bidders back…
Review.Contenu: Hey dont always have the bidders back when a pravite saler dont stay to the terms on the website but they are so quick to cut off the bidder if the bidder dont follow the terms

Review.Titre: All depend on storage manager
Review.Contenu: All depend on storage manager, how and when you will get the access. Moreover, we should be allowed to check the things to be same place as in the pictures, as my first-time storage manager did not return my call nor allowed me to access into the facility and the time and efforts vested. In the second one it was only two bags and a carton; however, both begs were opened and thoroughly checked and found moved from what I have saw in the pictures

Review.Titre: I like the convenience of buying on…
Review.Contenu: I like the convenience of buying on storage treasures. But, I don’t like the extended period of closing the auction, the minutes sometimes turns into an hour. Also, the lack of transparency as to whom is bidding, other on line sites have verified user names to show the actual bid in live time.

Review.Titre: Fairly easy to use but the website has…
Review.Contenu: Fairly easy to use but the website has issues. My main complaint is that navigating is annoying when you go back to the list view from a single unit view, you are always sent to the top of the page and not to where you were in the list.

Review.Titre: Storage treasures is a great   Needs to update their policies with seller
Review.Contenu: Storage treasures is a great site, however limited support With issues from the seller.  The  time line to empty out the units should be clarified for example : “let’s say a seller is open only from 8 am to 12pm: to them each day 24 horse makes up the 72hrs to empty 3 days. To me the buyer who has a life, children etc.. that’s 4 hours each day. Meaning,  i the Buyer have 18 days to get my purchase.” This site should specifically state 72 business operating hours to empty.

Review.Titre: Rules need to adjusted
Review.Contenu: Rules need to state if it's your own unit( that has gone to auction) that you will be wasting time bidding on the unit.  I tried and pleaded for my unit not to go to auction since I got paid 4 days after auction date. Wouldn't have it. I signed up/bidded and won the auction. Paid only to then be told I can't do that.

Review.Titre: I don’t like being taken advantage from…
Review.Contenu: I don’t like being taken advantage from by the Storage facility. You guys are great when you are able to be reached but Public Storage is so hard to work with I wish they went back to live. Online they feel to much control with the timeframe. We should have 48 belts to pay for locker and then 48hrs to work the locker. Every time I go to them they say one day per locker. That’s not right. Please have a stronger relationship with these storage facilities so they know what the rules are for timeframe. I get the rules when I’m on there facility but the timeframe needs to be consistent with other facilities that are bought on your site. 48hrs.

Review.Titre: Good job, but there is room for improvement.
Review.Contenu: I would add a notification to my phone as I do not always check my email as often.  The site is good, but I would recommend having different subcategories to filter with.  An example would be "no minimum bids made" or "locker cleanout offer."

Review.Titre: I like the different varieties of…
Review.Contenu: I like the different varieties of lockers and what can be found. I dislike when an auction gets canceled less than a day after watching it or bidding on it all week.

Review.Titre: Not enough time to get the unit cleaned…
Review.Contenu: Not enough time to get the unit cleaned out and not a fan of only going during hours the office is open, other companies provide a temporary code and give extended hours. When someone is getting a unit and have to clean out between 9 to 5 and no availability if the office is closed for lunch etc. 72 hours is not enough because it is not 72 hours when you can only go during day hours after 10 am before 5 pm. Will not bid on units from Prime storage again.

Review.Titre: Sold after time is expired not extended
Review.Contenu: I dont like the auction can keep getting extended by 3  every time a bid is placed under 3 minute mark. It should end when time is up. That needs changed.  Live auctions end immediately. Also if you win a auction and the owner gets there before you and pays you lose it. That should also be changed.

Review.Titre: Website seems functional enough
Review.Contenu: Website seems functional enough, but I wasnt given the chance to fully use it. Was unable to contact the seller after winning, but I was told I needed to wait until end of day the day after clean out time.  Effectively monopolized 2 days for no reason.  I was able to get a refund but it was frustrating having to sink time into a lost cause before getting the refund approved.

Review.Titre: When i pick a storage to view and bid…
Review.Contenu: When i pick a storage to view and bid on, i would like to be able to scroll up and pick another storage to view instead of having to go back to the options menu and go back to online auctions.

Review.Titre: Sacramento-Life Storage
Review.Contenu: Bought a unit in Sacramento-Life Storage #3510. I called the office in advance to come and make a payment and find out the details, the rude behavior of the employees was very surprising - because I heard only the best about Life Storage. When we arrived at the office, the manager said that in order to withdraw the unit that we won, we have the right to enter only by truck and only once, and that no one will let us in our car and that it is written out in the rules of their company, although there is no such information on the site. It was a shame to spend my time and resources on this attitude to customers. Guys, be very careful when contacting Life Storage, because there is a chance you won’t be able  to pick up your things.

Review.Titre: It would be nice to do live auctions
Review.Contenu: It would be nice to do live auctions. The online pictures can often hide the excessive garbage and the pics are difficult to see the quality of the items. Some of the storage businesses seem to be a little less than honest at times. For example, some of the storage units have rules against storing food in the units. However, some customers store large quantities of food,,,the mice find these units, eat through the packaging, crap all over the unit and the storage owners know that when they open the unit and take pictures. However, they never say anything about the mice and open food in their descriptions!

Review.Titre: Some of the rules in place are too…
Review.Contenu: Some of the rules in place are too harsh. some situations are truly accidents, while others are deliberate. Should they have the same consequences? sometimes the punishment doesn't fit the crime. Some people do learn from their mistakes and shouldn't be lumped in with repeat offenders.

Review.Titre: rights to unit
Review.Contenu: I like bidding on here, but I feel that once an auction starts the owner has no more rights to the unit. On more than one occurrence I've won an auction and the facility will not answer or return phone calls then all of a sudden I get a text message stating that the auction has been canceled due to payment being made by unit owner. The rules need to be updated or changed about when the ownership of unit ends for the unit owner.

Review.Titre: Old 2010 Computers
Review.Contenu: I was able to get the items I wanted that was listed, but those items were outdated and not functional.

Review.Titre: Looking at other lockers pictures your…
Review.Contenu: Looking at other lockers pictures your site would constantly take me back to the first one I looked at.

Review.Titre: Safe and Easy, Needs to Manage Bad Sellers Better
Review.Contenu: Depending on your area, you might not find any better place to bid on storage auctions than Storage Treasures.  The site is easy to use, has a good format for viewing photos, and is safe and trustworthy.  However, the sellers are not, necessarily.  Storage Treasures needs to implement some better ground rules and consequences for sellers.  Buyers should be able to rate sellers, as there are some who are not honest, have poor pictures, or are generally unfriendly.  There isn't even a clear way to report things like items moved/removed from units.  Please implement some changes that will help protect buyers from poor sellers.

Review.Titre: Sticky Fingers
Review.Contenu: The one suggestion I would have is somebody filming while the unit is being open.It would keep an employee at the facility from getting sticky fingers. Because without that it’s sure to happen and almost certainly does happen

Review.Titre: In the midst of a highly competitive…
Review.Contenu: In the midst of a highly competitive auction, where I was the highest bidder by nearly 100 dollars, other participants continued to bid but none higher than my posted maximum.  Nonetheless, the countdown timer for bidding continued to reset each time someone added $10 to their original low bid.  I think that is the wrong approach!  The countdown timer should not reset unless a new maximum bid is posted.

Review.Titre: I’m not pleased at all of the 3 minute…
Review.Contenu: I’m not pleased at all of the 3 minute time extension if someone places a bid when the auction is about to end. If the auctions is about to expire let it expire. Does not make sense to add more time to it . It add more fees that you all charge that are already steep. If you have 10 sec to bid then it should close to the highest bidder and close . No reset for additional time if some one else places a bid with seconds or a minute left.

Review.Titre: Their policy is not quite accurate
Review.Contenu: Their policy is not quite accurate. My card was locked when they tried to process a payment and I almost lost the unit to the second bidder. It states that you have 24 hours to pay. This was just a couple hours after the auction ended. Storage Treasures bills immediately for the auction fees. The rest is paid in cash to the storage facility. The storage facility has been wonderful to work with. Lorraine made this experience very pleasant.

Review.Titre: Cleaning deposit is to big in some…
Review.Contenu: Cleaning deposit is to big in some places,few times money was changed by mistake but never refunded .Some units don’t look like the pictures on auction.Cleaning time is not enough. Public storage only one does not charge cleaning deposit and have enough time.

Review.Titre: Good but could improve always
Review.Contenu: Over all I thank the site is grate but it says the byers premium is 15% but when you win its moor like 30% they have some hidden fees or sompthing because I wasn't expecting to pay what I did after I won i just wish they would give like a example chart instead of letting you just find out your self but over all im still going to be using the site.

Review.Titre: Pictures quality
Review.Contenu: I'm concerned that the person taking the pictures has already gone through the contents of the storage(some pictures are taken inside the unit instead of from the door.)And when the storage is jam packed the pictures are of low quality and you can't really see what you are bidding for.

Review.Titre: Big gap in control over …
Review.Contenu: I like that there is big amount of auctions. I don't like that storage treasures allows managers of the units to cancel auctions at any time me and many other bidders I talked about believe that many times managers canceling auctions because of low price. There is absolutely no way to check why auctions was cancelled. I tried that. It makes managers to become owners of the units. And that's illegal

Review.Titre: Process is easy and convenient
Review.Contenu: Process is easy and convenient, but when I got to the unit, items visible in the picture were missing.  I'm a reseller so that's money out of my pocket.  Probably will avoid investing too much in units at that facility in the future.  Would be helpful if sellers were held accountable since buyers are expecting the contents as advertised.

Review.Titre: Bidders have rights too
Review.Contenu: As auction sites go, storage treasures is one of the better ones. However, the difficulty for a bitter to get an issue resolved or make contact with someone regarding a situation is not acceptable. Bidders should not have to shoulder the burden of the shortcomings of the facilities when they are not available, or the room is not as bid on.Note that this particular issue was long enough ago that I have forgotten the exact date. I believe the date I show below is correct.

Review.Titre: Dislike receiving an email that the…
Review.Contenu: Dislike receiving an email that the auction/storage unit I've bidded on has been CANCELED. Dislike auctions I've had high bids on disappear off my list a day before auction ends.

Review.Titre: Very difficult to alter my bids after…
Review.Contenu: Very difficult to alter my bids after being notified regarding being over bid.I received a call from a storage center telling me I won a bid, but was not notified by your company.I had been traveling in my car and figured I would had seen notifications but not availed to me.Good site, but needs tooling as I see it.

Review.Titre: Image layout and loading delays
Review.Contenu: I really don't like the picture layout. The layout on self storage auctions is much easier to see inside of the lockers. When expanding the images. Also I seem to spend a lot of times waiting for images to load. To be honest while waiting for the images to load a lot of times I'll look at other auction sites while waiting.

Review.Titre: I found it nefarious that the site went…
Review.Contenu: I found it nefarious that the site went down 30 mins before the auction ended so I couldn't watch to see that I was bid up to my max bid. I did have fun bidding and collecting the unit as it was my first time. I will use this site again and am hoping it was a one time occurrence. I'm glad there are sites like this.

Review.Titre: going through stuff and staging is not right!!!
Review.Contenu: although I have had very good experience with previous auctions I find it interesting that while I am  looking at auctions now, 12-21-22, I see pictures of items opened and touched and moved.  totally apparent that things have been went through..  sometimes even staged..  We as buyers cant be sure that whomever is taking the pictures didnt take things..  Isn't it unlawful to go through things and or stage items in order to make it look good or to take things for themselves??  upsetting

Review.Titre: Great app but would recommend better customer service
Review.Contenu: The whole experience was great except trying to get ahold of a actual person. I had to use the live chat to contact them know I had updated my payment method and needed them to charge the new card so I could get the storage unit. Definitely would be nice if you weren't told to use the website when you called them.

Review.Titre: It's cool that there's a website versus…
Review.Contenu: It's cool that there's a website versus visiting and calling each location. However, it's frustrating not always being notified that you've been outbid. And when you do it's been by quite a bit based on the bid you have to raise. And how do we actually know that someone else is actually bidding versus the system just raising the bids for more profit.

Review.Titre: Not the happiest person
Review.Contenu: For the most part, everything was going pretty well and then one of the options that I won. I showed up to the storage facility to collect the items inside the storage unit and they told me that I did not win the auction because the store manager decided to move the auction to another day, that store manager is blaming storage treasures for it still being active on the website who is telling the truth I do not know all I know is storage treasures took my money and has not refunded me. Also, when I call storage treasures, I can’t seem to get anybody on the phone. All I keep getting is automated messages. I think that automated messages is terrible customer service, especially when it is auction sites and people have a lot of questions.

Review.Titre: Would like bud manager to show all…
Review.Contenu: Would like bud manager to show all units you are/were bidding on in the current 72hr period! Once I’ve been outbid and not known I can’t find anything on which units I’ve bud on!Also storage facilities should do more pictures and/or better pictures, some do not do more than 2-3 pictures for a larger u it!

Review.Titre: They do fine at connecting people
Review.Contenu: They do fine at connecting people.  On these particular auctions that I one the depiction and the pictures were not 100% accurate.  That is not usually one of the risks that you take, live and learn.  I understand that it can be argued that if is not technically this website’s fault, but they did post the pictures and the description without verification.  I will still use the website.  I won’t bid on any units at that storage facility.

Review.Titre: Too many mistakes on posting of storage…
Review.Contenu: Too many mistakes on posting of storage units. Not all of units available being posted properly, some didn’t have pictures of unit that was available. Poor communication being given about pickup and pay locations.

Review.Titre: I  was happy with treasures
Review.Contenu: I was happy with storage treasures, wasn’t pleased with the facility. Unmanned and gate wasn’t working. When I tried to find out what was goin on I was told to call a # then they said to call a # . After I told them I was in the auction they just kinda blew me off .

Review.Titre: I truly enjoy being part of storage…
Review.Contenu: I truly enjoy being part of storage wars but feel sometime that things are being removed after pictures have been taken.  There have been a few times I was 100 percent certain I know what I was buying and then when I pick up the locker the item I was going for is no longer in there.  Also don't understand why you can't sell the vehicles with the lockers?  Otherwise I would have given a five star review.  It's an awesome way to extra cash on the side and fun at the same time.

Review.Titre: Didn’t send emails when I won the units…
Review.Contenu: Didn’t send emails when I won the units and couldn’t navigate the website to even know I won the units and charged me for the unit when didn’t let me have the unit I supposedly won the only reason I got the one unit is the facility owner called me. Other than this one time it’s been pretty flawlessThank you for the explanation of this storagemart states this is all automatically with you guys so I am not sure who why or what happened it’s really unfortunate situation. Hopefully you will refund my buyers fee because I did not receive the unit like promised. Thank you for a reply I really appreciate it.

Review.Titre: I don't think its professional to post…
Review.Contenu: I don't think its professional to post a unit and after a buyer pays their deposit , the then customer is still able to make payment and then the auction gets canceled. The unit should not be posted until it it officially sellable. That adds paper work , more transactions and a headache. Also alot of the units look ran through as if someone has we ttheough them and took out what they want and then resold.  I've bought a few so far and I see that alot. Not sure what policy is but I believe no one should be allowed to go into and snoop through units other then customer and buyer.

Review.Titre: Seems that in recent transactions I…
Review.Contenu: Seems that in recent transactions I have lost good units to things like bad paperwork or customer just happen to pay their bill, coincidence?? My last 2 transaction that I was winning bidder. Late April and early may.

Review.Titre: The fact they offered a unit to me the…
Review.Contenu: The fact they offered a unit to me the get to the place and the guy from the storage told me that the other person show up for the unit that’s unprofessional, on who’s doing better Lockerfox on there. Page also better pictures better website,

Review.Titre: Everything worked out fairly well
Review.Contenu: Everything worked out fairly well. There were hidden fees that did not appear until after the sale was made and the storage unit was missing items that were in the picture at the time of bidding but other than that everything went fairly smooth.

Review.Titre: Where's my refund!
Review.Contenu: After winning an auction and contacting the storage unit, when in route an hour later I received a call from the same storage unit to tell me the owner had paid the night before. Storage Treasures had no problem immediately taking my fee money, even when the auction should have been cancelled, yet it has been 6 days since then and I still haven't gotten my refund!

Review.Titre: I was have an issue where my CC was…
Review.Contenu: I was having an issue where my CC was declined. My wallet was stolen, and I had changed cards. I changed the info online, but tge system showed I didn’t win the locker on my phone app when I got to the location… So I got on the phone and the facility also got on the phone, it was over an hour with both of us on the phone waiting for someone to pick up on the other end. I called tge premium line and she called as a facility… I finally left and drove 30 minutes back home still on the phone 1.5 hrs now and finally got through to be told the situation has been fixed…I can’t believe I was on hold that long… I had to wait until the nrxt day to go back…

Review.Titre: This site is very fun and really cool
Review.Contenu: This site is very fun and really cool, the experience that i disliked so far is that when I won a free storage, I drove to the place to get it and someone else had a receipt that they won it already

Review.Titre: I have been buying units on this…
Review.Contenu: I have been buying units on this platform since it began. Everything always seems to go smoothly, I have bought over a thousand units on here, I have only one complaint, they need to change how they do back up bidders BUB. Too many times bidders will bid up units on someone who actually wants it, and then it gets dropped on them, and then they don't pay for it, All of that bidder's bids should be completely wiped out, to where they started bidding at. And then and only then should it be offered to the next highest bidder, they had no intentions of paying for the unit to begin with... not very fair to bidders who buy and buy everyday faithfully...

Review.Titre: Alright
Review.Contenu: The fact that the storage had no attendant so I couldn't get in my storage until some one came from were ever had me running back and forth to the storage. But it was alright when I got the storage open.

Review.Titre: All the good stuff in the photos had already been taken out.
Review.Contenu: When I went to claim my storage unit most of the items that caught my eye had already been removed.  I had been able to take a screenshot of the one photo in the winning bids section, but I could not find the other photos after the bidding closed. Luckily it was enough to get my money back on the unit, but I had already wasted money on a rental vehicle to take the stuff home. This was my first unit and I am not sure if I want to risk losing money bidding on line again.

Review.Titre: Website needs work…
Review.Contenu: Website needs work especially for smart phone use. What good is facial recognition if you’re going to make me put in a # from a text and also an anti-bot wall?Having just the facial recognition should be enough.

Review.Titre: I have had good and bad experiences
Review.Contenu: I have had good and bad experiences. Good ones were units were what was listed. The last one I bought I paid $270 for only to be told that it was already won in an auction and picked through, and the person never showed back up to finish. So essentially I paid the storage unit to clean out their trash. I wonder if the person who stated the facility bids to drive up prices is correct. HMM, The lady at the front desk stated she has been watching the unit on auction and the bidding went crazy within the last 10 minutes which drove the price up so high. I thought the facility employees did not have access to the auction.

Review.Titre: Some items were missing from the unit…
Review.Contenu: Some items were missing from the unit when I got it.  Can't seem to get a straight answer from anyone on how to resolve the issue.

Review.Titre: Website not always mobile friendly.
Review.Contenu: Website lags a lot. And always puts you back at the begining of the page after you look at a unit and try to go back. Sort order isn't always correct.Maybe have a mobile app to download. Mke it mobile friendlier. Works fine on PC

Review.Titre: Questionable
Review.Contenu: Some of their policies definitely lean towards the buyers. Allowing them to claim goods even after auctions are over if the items haven't been picked up by winning bidder.

Review.Titre: The website could use some improvement
Review.Contenu: The website could use some improvement. When I put in search parameters and then check out individual listings the site sometimes loses my parameters and I have to start the search over. Otherwise smooth process overall!

Review.Titre: I like the online auctions
Review.Contenu: I like the online auctions, because I can view many auctions in a very short amount of time, but they all should except debit or credit as well as cash as payment.

Review.Titre: I think the action was great
Review.Contenu: I think the action was great, biding is fun, but the storage was awful the stuff felt wet and there was mouse poop on everything it was gross, on top of mise running around. I just hope that I didn't bring any home.

Review.Titre: Website constantly has issues… arrr…
Review.Contenu: Website constantly has issues… arrr matey! Frustrating when web page won’t load, crashes, stop working right in the middle of something very time sensitive!

Review.Titre: Needs improvement for buyers
Review.Contenu: What I like is that your work with a lot of storage facilities. What I dislike is your website is always freezing and stalling and it can’t never stay on the web page when I’m bidding on multiple units. Also the zoom in future needs work. Also you guys might want to make it into an app. You would imagine the 100 subscription price with get us more

Review.Titre: Website has issues
Review.Contenu: Website has issues. Bid manager doesn’t work very well. Keep getting an error message and having to start it over. Other then that everything else was great!!

Review.Titre: Descriptions/photos need work!
Review.Contenu: The description/pictures of the units are not even close to what they need to be. I bought 2 units. One turned out to be a “in the house smoker”unit, so everything had to go in the trash. The other unit looked to be staged to me. It looked like there were power tools with boxes. After I opened the unit and moved some of the boxes, it was 100% trash. There is no way someone was paying to store that stuff there. It honestly looked like a bunch of leftover stuff from other units all shoved into that one. I say that because nothing matched. There were two miss match box springs, 1 wheel, a bunch of door handles and screws loose on the ground, 2-3 random baby toys (covered in oil from the floor of the unit), empty power tool boxes, an old exercise bike, 2 plastic chairs,etc. EVERYTHING WAS TRASH. Even a random bag of clothes was grease covered and ripped. I understand having bad luck with the smokers unit, but it would be nice if they mentioned that in the description. As far as the other unit goes, I feel like I got tricked because the boxes were covering all the trash underneath them. Maybe some better pictures and a little history of the unit in the description would be nice.

Review.Titre: Not what I vid on
Review.Contenu: My unit that I won took 2 days to gain access to and then the main items that were pictured were not in unit. Unit was ramshackle and not all all what I bid for. I told the storage facility and they said someone had to have broken into the unit after auction. Sad that I drove over an hour several trips for nothing I was bidding on unit for

Review.Titre: I love using the website
Review.Contenu: I love using the website, it’s a thrill to never know what you’re going to find. Recently I won an auction. It was a for a huge truck, awesome. A buddy of mine needed the parts for of it, I got it for a good deal and so on. So I won the auction and 8 minutes after the end of an auction it was cancelled. Now I didn’t check my email after winning the auction because I was so excited I was already on my way to the storage unit to claim my prize! But luckily enough the employee from the storage location gave me a call and told me the bad news. It was extremely upsetting but life goes on. Just wish when you were bidding on something they would tell you flat out.

Review.Titre: For the most part I have been happy…
Review.Contenu: For the most part I have been happy with Storage Treasures.  Most of the units are as described and the bidding process easy.  On the other side I had one auction that the site did not tell me that GPS systems take you to the wrong site and I pd for a extra 25 miles in mileage fees for the truck rental.  I had one site that was so mouse and rat infested I had to throw everything but 2 pieces of furniture away due to droppings, urine and chewing damage.  I just won a Pod container and found out you have 1 day to get your items out and that is between 8AM and 3PM.  The only information I was given was a 24 hour waiting period to get your Pod out of the warehouse.  Spoke with the Manager of Pods in Florida and she told me it was Storage Treasures responsibility to let me know, not theirs.  I told her Pods should update the information on their write up page on Storage Treasures.

Review.Titre: Kicks U out
Review.Contenu: I have been calling storage treasurer off & on for years about their problem with the site. When you are looking at a unit and you back out of it to look at another unit it takes you back to where you have to put your zip code in and on more than one occasion it will knock you out to were you have to log back in. And I have lost a unit because of this happening one time. Now with their new security code when you sign in sometimes I can see were this could cause more problems especially if you’re bidding on multiple units and you’re cutting the time to close. I really don’t think they care or they would have done something about this by now. I have no problems on any other sites.

Review.Titre: Waste of my time
Review.Contenu: I liked bidding and the excitement of winning. I disliked this was this first time ever using the services and both units got ripped from me. One right before auction was up the company removed it. The second I won it paid the money and storage company changed their mind. My time is more valuable than that foaks.

Review.Titre: I like and also strongly dislike…
Review.Contenu: I like and also strongly dislike Storage Treasures.  Some of how they do things bothers me....and I don't like that there is no phone number or way to speak to customer service over the phone. Nor did they even bother to reply to my email about my frustrations,  which makes me believe they don't care.

Review.Titre: They are not clear about time frames…
Review.Contenu: They are not clear about time frames like when they start and stop, and if u make one tiny mistake like winning an auction right before a snowstorm,they close your account for a month. Kind of ridiculous

Review.Titre: The fees they charge are quite high
Review.Contenu: The fees they charge are quite high. Whatever you pay for locker understand that you'll be paying a 25% fee on top of that. Also, this was a lien unit but it definitely appeared the stuff was gone through and not very nicely either. Alot of stuff was broke and dumped out.

Review.Titre: I was sold a unit that was broke into...
Review.Contenu: I bought a unit that was not like the photos that was shown on the website. When I got to the facility I was told were the unit was and they gave me a code to one of the facilities locks that had a number on it for them to keep track of. When I open the unit everything was gone but some tarps and the was another one of the facilities locks on the ground in the unit,  and it had been cut of by some one. So the issue I have with it was that the facility would have to known about the first lock being cut because they had put a second one on it. That say at the very least they knew the lock was cut off and they failed to let anyone know so that it could be taken down . And I am out the money I paid for the unit. Sucks

Review.Titre: This is not Storage Wars!
Review.Contenu: Storage treasures in general is pretty decent and straight forward. To use the site on a mobile device can sometimes be infuriating because there’s no easy way to go back to the search list I’ve been looking at without having to enter the info in again and then scroll from the beginning. There’s also something wrong with the zoom function that makes it very hard to see what’s in the unit without having to rely on super tiny pics. The experience after winning a unit is hit or miss though. Some facilities are on top of their auctions and when you arrive, everything is good to go. The ones that aren’t chain-stores I’ve noticed tend to have way more issues including: not having change when you get there even though you have to pay in cash, getting the units mixed up, not being at the facility when you get there, etc.     Overall it’s a fun experience but more like buying a scratch ticket than making an investment, because from the pictures you never really know what you’re bidding on except a few items on the surface.

Review.Titre: Apparently for the second time it seems…
Review.Contenu: Apparently for the second time it seems that the units are verified before going, there are no things worthwhile.  I have bought them before and they have not put so much garbage on it.

Review.Titre: Too many auctions get cancelled.
Review.Contenu: Too many auctions get cancelled. Always seems to be on lockers that are worth more than is being bidded.

Review.Titre: Didn’t like being suspended before…
Review.Contenu: Didn’t like being suspended before checking the whole issue.  Got quick turn around tho.  Don’t like the fact that they can’t b reached and also haven’t responded to any of my emails   I do like what they offer.  Big selection

Review.Titre: It's an ok experience
Review.Contenu: It's an ok experience. From my personal standpoint this is a science, the first wins you have aren't going to be that great. Communication with the storage facility isn't really mediated via storage treasure. But it is legitimate and I found some cool stuff.

Review.Titre: Not enough time!
Review.Contenu: The only thing I really dislike is your not given enough time after winning a unit to clean it out before they block you from being able to bid again. Like most people I have a job and these storage places close at like 5:00 so I might have to wait for my day off. So if it's 3 or 4 days away, I'm getting blocked. So I either have to miss work or risk getting blocked from bidding.

Review.Titre: The website
Review.Contenu: The website, when I’m browsing on ipad a click back most the time it makes me go back to homepage and have to enter an all  the same information again. It’s irritating and redundant. Wish they would take the time to fix this issue.

Review.Titre: Buyers premium charge…
Review.Contenu: I don't like the fact that they charge a 15% buyers premium.

Review.Titre: Stuff happens
Review.Contenu: I understand policy as far as buyers are concerned but some times when we bid on a unit we have every intention on removing the contents of the unit we may have won but sometimes things comes up beyond our control and we don’t have choice to leave the unit for another day then we Get locked out of our account and are basically banned even though we have let the storage facility know what is happening I don’t agree with this policy

Review.Titre: Very disappointing some facilities…
Review.Contenu: Very disappointing some facilities don't open early most after 10am and customers service is not good

Review.Titre: I thought there were too many added…
Review.Contenu: I thought there were too many added fees placed on top of the actual auction price. They would only take cash and not a credit card, which was an additional fee for me to obtain cash.

Review.Titre: Long wait time
Review.Contenu: 1. A. My card was charged a pending charge immediately after the auction ended. When I went to the storage facility they requested I pay for the unit. This was confusing because I thought it was already paid for on my card. I still had to pay a $100 deposit for cleaning which was fine. I just was not expecting to pay for the locker again. He said the charge would fall off in a few days. The specifics of paying should be on the winning notice page so I can print it and show it to the storage facility as proof. B. The guy behind the counter was very rigid in needing the auction number and my ID, yet he still could not find which storage locker # I won. Isn’t the sale linked to the bidders name, phone, email,etc? Why was this so difficult and it seemed between waiting to get my locker # and waiting to collect my deposit I lost more than 30mins of my work day. NOT EFFICIENT.2. The specific # address of the facility was not on your site. It said “ Uhaul at Goldenrod road,Orlando”. Your software should default not to accept inadequate addresses. There are multiple Uhaul on goldenrod road.  I lost about 20mins asking which Uhaul my win was at by having to stop, park,go in,wait in line,leave go 11 mins down the road etc.etc.This was not a good experience in terms of the logistics of your system. I wasted almost an hour of my day either looking for the facility or waiting at the facility for what was only a hand full of items. It may not be much time to some people, to me time is valuable as something you cannot get back so I hope you will review your process for address location entry as well as how your clients are trained to use your system.

Review.Titre: I won the auction
Review.Contenu: I won the auction.  I rented a car, took time off from work, arrived in another city.  And they told me that I can not collect my winnings because it is no longer for sale.

Review.Titre: Was apparent that storage facility had…
Review.Contenu: Was apparent that storage facility had gone through before auctioning just based off knowledge of what was listed under description of items listed. It listed fishing gear, which was buried in boxes and not visible without digging.

Review.Titre: There was an issue with updating my…
Review.Contenu: There was an issue with updating my payment information. It took over an hour to fix the problem but it was resolved and then it was a great experience!

Review.Titre: I like the platform they make…
Review.Contenu: I like the platform they make available, however they aren't as customer service oriented as they should be. I made contact recently questioning some photos a facility was using and wanted verification anout the unit size. I was told to call the facility and ask. I responded by asking wasn't that what ST should be doing? Holding their facilities responsible and accountable for their listing and photos? I was completely ignored and an answer was never given.ST does not seem to support their bidders as well as they should, just my opinion. But just as they receive $ from the facilities, I feel they receive mich more $ from their bidders, so I feel they should be more supportive and protective of their bidders. But in a fair manner, I'm not asking for them to do anything unfairly, but at least look into the concerns we bring to their attention. If they did so, made facilities provide photos that aren't blurry, make sure unit sizes are correct and check on shill bidding and why unit "owners" always manage to pay their debt within an hour of auctions ending. This happens at every facility 90% of the time an auction gets close to closing. Way, way too coincidental. ST tries to do a good job, but I feel they need to try and do a Great job.

Review.Titre: Website malfunction....
Review.Contenu: Well when I first began to use Storage Treasures everything was great. Now for the pass 2 months the website is not working correctly. I have to refresh all the time to see the Storage its very frustrating. I called them to ask for help but they said its my computer. Trust me its not all my computers and cell phone as well, I don't think so. Hope they fix this because I do enjoy buy from them. Thank You

Review.Titre: Blocking someone without knowing the truth!?!?
Review.Contenu: I had a very bad experience with a facility manager and they kept threatening to have me blocked on your site if i didn't "wear a mask" "wear it the way i told you" and then they wouldn't let me back in to get the rest of my units. Now im blocked by you from buying more because this person thinks that they run the world... when i called S.T. (STORAGETREASURES) i was informed that theres nothing i can do.But when i showed you proof that another facility was "staging" fake units and stealing from them AFTER we the bidders won they. Nothing was done about that facility. I was given 72hrs to empty over 12 units during Thanksgiving... when i returned to finish. My door code didn't work hence the not being aloud to get my stuff. I've called the facility many times and the manager had not responded. And yet im being punished.

Review.Titre: Ok so far
Review.Contenu: Site has been pretty good.I was high bidder on storage unit, watched the clock drop to zero but didn’t get the unit. I sent question to Storage Treasures, they never responded.

Review.Titre: Great service
Review.Contenu: Great service, they use a non-complicated system that makes use easy for any level of experienced user. And profile setup is relatively easy and quick as well. Only thing I wish was different would be having to refresh my page often to show an accurate countdown timer. Overall a very good service though! Much appreciated!

Review.Titre: Overall pleasant experience
Review.Contenu: The auction page with the auction, you selected, has various other auction similar to it at the bottom of the page, but if you click on those other options, it doesn’t go anywhere and reload the same page over and over again. The quality of the photos are not that great but the overall experience was pleasant and I enjoyed the auctions. I enjoy the emails when I’m out bed so I know immediately to go back in bed.

Review.Titre: Very easy to do however the people at…
Review.Contenu: Very easy to do however the people at the places are hard to get ahold of and some offices have no idea how to handle the units being sold so you have to wait hours to get someone to know how to and be at the facility

Review.Titre: I love the way the lockers are…presented
Review.Contenu: I love the way the lockers are presented and the usual quick response from where I got the locker. There have however been a few times where they don't have anyone on site and looking at their hours it shows them to be open 8-6 or 8-5 and I have driven up there to pick up a locker and then found out it is an unmanned facility. I realize if you scroll down to the bottom it tells you that. It would be helpful if it was stated where the locker is shown. That being said overall I am pleased with Storage Treasures.

Review.Titre: was easy to use
Review.Contenu: was easy to use, bid and pay, however would like to be able to easily view auctions I did not win that were saved in my account

Review.Titre: Site runs mostly ok… doesn’t go back to…
Review.Contenu: Site runs mostly ok… doesn’t go back to where you were after looking at an auction. Also, doesn’t keep a history/let you see final bids prices on units you lost.  Could offer insight to bidders.  Oh, and will you FINALLY add a sort function by unit size????  Some of us aren’t looking for 45x90 units!!!

Review.Titre: Meh, gets the job done.
Review.Contenu: UPDATE: FOUND INFORMATION THAT MAKES MY COMPLAIMT ABOUT BIDDING VOID. GREAT SITE, FEES HIGHER THAN I WOULD LIKE.. BUMPING TO 4 STARS Auctions are easy. Sucks to have to refresh page constantly. Fees are too high to not have an app, or a site that auto updates the bids. Also, sometimes I'll place a bid say for $150, the system will say " bid accepted, you've been out bid, bid again" but the bid will still be at $150. Doesn't make sense. It's like they are running up the bids to make money off their 15% fee.

Review.Titre: Happy holidays…
Review.Contenu: I would of gave 5 stars but you need to make it a little easier for us to contact your customer service for any questions we may have the emailing in a pain in the neck and I went through hell getting the 800 number but happy holidays

Review.Titre: The last few units had cockroaches
Review.Contenu: The last few units had cockroaches, which are nearly impossible to spot in the pictures as opposed to in person auctions. We had to circle the area for dumpsters to trash everything since most storage doesn't allow onsite disposal. And as always, I let the storage company facility know 🙄 On the plus side, it is easier to see units in different areas without having to drive to see them all.

Review.Titre: Website is very easy to use
Review.Contenu: Website is very easy to use, I appreciate how emails are sent to me regarding winning bids and when invoices are ready.

Review.Titre: Good Results
Review.Contenu: Made my first auction win and was happy with the results.

Review.Titre: System is easy to use
Review.Contenu: System is easy to use, guidelines in place are easy to understand. Opens up areas that in-person cannot do

Review.Titre: Easy
Review.Contenu: Easy bidding and payment

Review.Titre: Very nice experience
Review.Contenu: This was my second online auction for a unit I had won. The lady was very helpful in explaining things of how it works

Review.Titre: The experience was frustrating trying…
Review.Contenu: The experience was frustrating trying to get a live person. I needed to update my new card on file while I went to pick up my unit before work.  Once I tried the approach of being the facility … my phone call was answered by a Man who knew what he was doing. Made sure all info was updated and sent out two confirmation letters because I ended up being highest bidder on 2 units.   It’s a nightmare when you need to speak with a live person for an issue happening in real time. Other than that Storage Treasures is a great place to purchase through Thanks,                   Lori M

Review.Titre: The platform of Storage Treasures works…
Review.Contenu: The platform of Storage Treasures works well. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I feel they need to regulate facilities better. They should push for better descriptions and pictures. I have found some facilities will not show the bad on purpose. They should be required to show all, good and bad. Also the generic description of boxes, bags and totes should not be aloud. I have seen pictures without a single tote or box but still says so.

Review.Titre: So far so good
Review.Contenu: So far so good, I enjoy the way the fees are set up, they are very reasonable

Review.Titre: Clean out/ Dumpster needed
Review.Contenu: The experience itself was without any major confusion just wish they had a dumpster or a container for trash...this was an inconvenience since honestly you do not know how much you need to get rid of.

Review.Titre: The truth....
Review.Contenu: The website itself is easy to use and customer service has been helpful when needed. My only complaints are the websites acceptance of blurry photos and photos that do not show the entire unit. Some sellers have hidden large items like mattresses, pianos, etc to get bids. There are a lot of buyers that win an auction only to take the expensive items and leave the rest. I have seen the same units sell more than one time. This is a common occurrence which tells me these people are not getting reported.

Review.Titre: High fee, terrible website.
Review.Contenu: Storage Treasures is easy to use, but the website has a terrible user experience, and the 15% hit is hidden and too high. It won’t be long before another app undercuts them or they change the rates.

Review.Titre: Might be 5-stars if they could work out the bugs, treat buyers the same as facilities
Review.Contenu: Overall Storage Treasures has far more auctions than any other storage auction website. However their site crashes all the time. I’m on the go, and have to use my iPhone. Their site seems to crash and always pops up an “Aaarhh Matey!” Pirate symbol when it does. Not sure if it’s an iPhone thing or what. Desktop not a problem. Wish they would get this resolved. While I’m glad to get a discount with my monthly membership, from a 15% buyers premium to 10% (it adds up) I still think the buyers premium is too high. But again, more auctions = more opportunities. So I use them a lot. I’ve only had one bad customer service experience. They chose the storage facility over me. We are BOTH a customer, and I would like to be given equal ground. There are some unscrupulous storage owners/managers out there. Happy hunting!

Review.Titre: The bidding wasn’t bad
Review.Contenu: The bidding wasn’t bad. The unit had a lot of trash and it’s a lesson learned. That was my very first unit and that was an awesome experience for me and my family. I would truly keep bidding on units for the excitement. The lady at the facility was awesome to work with her name was Mrs. Jane. Thank you all for the awesome experience. I also would like to know more about the unit liquidation program. Can someone please direct my family  to make this a business in cleaning out unbid storage units. Mrs. Jane said that they need people bad at her office. Can someone please let us know how to sign up. Thanks again for the wonderful opportunity.

Review.Titre: I've been using storage treasures for…
Review.Contenu: I've been using storage treasures for years now and I love it! Always an easy transaction..thanks!!

Review.Titre: good experience
Review.Contenu: It was easy and fast and the people where friendly and helpful

Review.Titre: Protecting the auctioneers
Review.Contenu: The bidding process is quite simple. Improvements [must] take place to avoid the old/ real owner of the unit auctioned from contacting the auctioneer. This had happened to me twice in the last four (4) months and it is an awkward moment. What is to know if not only my phone is shared but my address too. This must definitely stop as it could lead to physical harm and for sure have legal ramifications. Another area to consider is limiting the number of pictures to about six (6).

Review.Titre: Credit card address not working
Review.Contenu: The credit card I was using has a p.o. box address and your system would not take in any way I put it in. It was a big pain in the ass after talking to 3 different people 3 different calls no one still helped me figure it out. But other than that it was wonderful.

Review.Titre: It was easy to bidon lockers
Review.Contenu: It was easy to bidon lockers. The only problem I have is everytine I look at pictures of a locker when I go back it takes me to where I have to start over and put in zip code

Review.Titre: Ok experience on a unit
