Review.Contenu: It was good experience but for some reason did not get any emails until the 11/10 and thta the end day the unit was suppose to be picked up hopefully the storage facility will let me pick it up today 11/11

Review.Titre: It was really easy to find auctions in…
Review.Contenu: It was really easy to find auctions in my area. I found that during the final hour and down to the last minutes it was hard to bid and I kept getting errors and had to reload the site several times. Luckily having the max amount you wanted bid option I was able to keep up with other bids coming in otherwise I probably would have not won the unit I was bidding on.

Review.Titre: Storages I have been good
Review.Contenu: Storages I have been good, there’s some ass, some storage units. We’ve been getting set up nice and neat boxes, stacked meat bags and eat it going to empty empty TV boxes empty boxes stacked neatly I guess you feel when I’m trying to say I just.

Review.Titre: Features and Function
Review.Contenu: The format, navigation and bidding experience are easy to use and straightforward.  Mobile, not so much. Navigation in Safari is okay at best.  Lots of errors pop up.  Google, a lesser experience and some features won’t work.  Have we thought about an app?  Free for people and they have set up an account to navigate/activate.  I’m sure it’s costly for an app, regardless so many people go mobile once they win a unit or bidding.  Having the confidence that the app will work would keep me bidding, otherwise going mobile, I rarely try to continue bidding due to errors the “ar matey” something went wrong when bidding.  I do recommend storage treasures all the time.  Thx!

Review.Titre: Storage Treasures was great, the facilities sometimes are different
Review.Contenu: Storage Treasures there were not problems. All was well as ling as you ready the rules and expectations. I will add watch the storage facilities; they do not always give you the time they state on Storage Treasures to get items removed. Example on Storage Treasures site states 72 hour clean out when you get to the facility you have to clean out only during office hours for three days which sometimes is equal to about 20-25 hours.

Review.Titre: Seems well designed
Review.Contenu: Seems well designed. Accurate and quick updates. The only con for me is that the site doesn’t always run well with safari on iPhone.

Review.Titre: YOUR LISTINGS ARE EASY TO SEE
Review.Contenu: YOUR LISTINGS ARE EASY TO SEE, ONLY MAIN ISSUE IS THE FACILITIES LACK OF CONSIDERATION TO THEIR OICTURES THEY SEND IN, THEY HAVE BEEN VERY BLURRY AND AT TIMES HARD TO SEE. THEIR DESCRIPTIONS BARELY MATCH THE UNITS. THEY HAVE BEEN USING THE SAME DESCRIPTION FOR EVERY UNIT.

Review.Titre: I love this site however after having a…
Review.Contenu: I love this site however after having a few problems with the workers at a 2 storage facilities I went for assistance from storage treasures I couldn’t get help. The agent seemed not to be interested. I’ve purchased quite a few units and pride myself on cleaning those units quickly and fully but when a circumstance arise to not have support isn’t good

Review.Titre: Great websites can always be better
Review.Contenu: Great website with a lot of variety, easy to navigate and maneuver the photos, except when the are taken with dirty lense or by person who doesn’t know how to work a camera, then it would be nice to be able to request better pics. Would also be great to have the option to pay with card online or over phone, to insure that unit is not bought back while buyer is driving to storage unit location, as some lockers may be quite far from buyer’s home location.

Review.Titre: Am doing well with my storage but some…
Review.Contenu: Am doing well with my storage but some private seller making food , alcohol and more but you never cancel this units for that am frustrated But otherwise is okay

Review.Titre: Ok experience. I would do it again.
Review.Contenu: Everything went as well as I imagined it would.Two less than desirable issues:1. During the bidding process the software kept logging me out and making me do a recaptcha screen multiple times.2. The information for pickup was only half-correct. This was a U-Hail storage sale and the address given me was for the storage location not the office. I had to get that off of a sign at the storage unit.

Review.Titre: The only issue I have had with storage…
Review.Contenu: The only issue I have had with storage treasures is buying a unit and getting half way there and being told the person paid for the unit. Any other auction, when the auctioneer says sold the item is gone. Storage treasures sould be the same way.

Review.Titre: good experience.
Review.Contenu: the only thing i can say is  what they said could be in the unit was not there

Review.Titre: storage treasures makes bidding on  and…
Review.Contenu: storage treasures makes bidding on  and winning storage units simple,   registration is very simple in the whole process is really user friendly and purchased about 10 units so far in the very pleased with the whole process, except for iron guard  storage in smokey point. I recommend staying away from that place the manager there is not a street shooter.

Review.Titre: The drive from Loganville to Sandy…
Review.Contenu: The drive from Loganville to Sandy Speings was not good. Please setup an online method of payment. The staff however was very informative and explained the entire process this was my first bid!!

Review.Titre: I had a good experience
Review.Contenu: I had a good experience, but the buyers fee is high

Review.Titre: Love it
Review.Contenu: Always a good time, better than gambling. Smooth operation.

Review.Titre: It wasn’t clear that the cleaning…
Review.Contenu: It wasn’t clear that the cleaning deposit funds had to be in cash so that delayed me by a day. Then, the box of personal affects I put together was stolen and the employee at the storage facility blamed me for losing it/getting it stolen. Great items in the unit though.

Review.Titre: I think you need a cancellation button…
Review.Contenu: I think you need a cancellation button three days before auction ends.  You should have contractor phone number who will help haul peoples auctions away.  Thank you for everything this is a great website.

Review.Titre: Everything worked out perfectly
Review.Contenu: Everything worked out perfectly. What I don't like is your company doesn't answer the phone, nor do you call back when I emailed asking for a return call. A huge negative for your company, that clearly doesn't care about the people paying your salaries!

Review.Titre: easy and simple
Review.Contenu: Easy and simple way to bid on storages

Review.Titre: Great experiences at the storage facilities
Review.Contenu: Great experiences for the 2 storages I've won so far. My only complaint is that too many units get cancelled... if negotiation is still going on with the owner, I feel it should not be listed then.

Review.Titre: All in all everything was smooth
Review.Contenu: All in all everything was smooth. No real snags. Just pass it forward to to public storage units to have the lock box for return of locks, near the offices Finding them is impossible in some storage facilities. A map of each storage site would be nice so you don’t have to drive around in circles.

Review.Titre: No deposit required
Review.Contenu: No deposit required. Like being able to pay with debit card as well.

Review.Titre: Good but other stuff could he better.
Review.Contenu: The units i have won were ok but i see alot of canceling even the day of and i get that happens.Storage treasures as a business has always been great. The canceling and the people that bid just to bid up make it annoying but that's all part of it.

Review.Titre: just call ahead to the storage to get accurate info on how much you owe.
Review.Contenu: (To be clear - if you buy a unit the fee from the website is taken off your payment card, the cash remainder is paid with cash only and cash deposit at the facility.)  This time around the storage facility was way more helpful than the website. I was confused about the website's fees taken electronically vs the facility payment that is cash. If the facility didn't explain when I went in that there is only the cash reminder, then I'd think there was a problem with website's payment fees and that i was undercharged.

Review.Titre: Most of the time u get everything done…
Review.Contenu: Most of the time u get everything done fast but there's been times where I win  I get there or it's been canceled n no one told me  I waste my time brushing to get there to get it done

Review.Titre: First time on Storage Treasures
Review.Contenu: First time on Storage Treasures sight was easy to navigate and place bids. Only hang up when trying to pay, I was sent to 2 other non related pages before I could pay for unit.

Review.Titre: Easy to use, but soft close needs to go
Review.Contenu: This site is one of the easiest to use. Being able to bid, and also put a max bid, is great. But, the soft close needs to go. The auction time is clearly stated, and adding an extra 3 min, because someone bids at the end, is honestly unfair. I would have had a few more auctions, if it wasn't for that soft close.Ok, this is my reply, to your reply. You say the soft close is like the auctioneer saying going once, going twice. But, that doesn't take 3 min, or add 3 min.

Review.Titre: I'm going to be honest
Review.Contenu: I'm going to be honest. I love the platform. The ease of bidding,the right area, more places than other platforms.  My grief is with canceled units. I believe that all units should only go up fir bid when the owner has legally lost control of it. I would rather bid on units that can truly be attained, than ones that can be canceled.  I understand the law behind this but don't agree. When you go to an auction, the item's now are up for sale. The resources on bidding with one unit are carefully scrutinized and to have it canceled.....please just hear this plee for a change somewhere in the system. Thank you.

Review.Titre: I really like how its run
Review.Contenu: I really like how its run. Ive bought a few lockers already.However i did lose a locker i was bidding at the last minute s bid was put in and i wasnt allowed to rebid it said sale was closed. I was watching it and never refreshed, i lost the locker.

Review.Titre: It's an easy process bidding
Review.Contenu: It's an easy process bidding. My only issue is that I don't think you should add more time each time someone bids on a unit, i know its only a minute or 2 but I still don't think it should be added.

Review.Titre: Easy to use
Review.Contenu: The website is easy to use for bidding, but I feel that the search function and the payment processing could be better.  I will definitely continue to use the site.

Review.Titre: I bought a storage unit ...went first…
Review.Contenu: I bought a storage unit ...went first day and got half of my stuff then went back next day and storage place wouldn't let me have it .This unit was not suppose to be sold at all .I drove over 80 miles for this unit .I wasn't compensated at all.

Review.Titre: The only 2 issues I have with your site…

Review.Titre: For a 1st time buyer

Very helpful in my new adventure in buying abandoned units. I have recommended you to my friend who actually started me on this adventure.

Review.Titre: Everything is easily done online
Review.Contenu: Everything is easily done online, if only all storage lockers were online like Storage Express.... I have used Storage Treasures at least 10 times in the Louisville Kentucky area. You need  credit or debit card on file for auction fees....locker fee paid to storage locker company....most you have to pay cash and talk to a person, a few are completely online/phone.... easier for me to schedule...

Review.Titre: Trustworthy, reliable and honest!

Even the storage facility personnel was a pleasure to deal with. Awesome experience!

Review.Titre: Customer support group was very…

Review.Contenu: I have always wanted to do a storage auction. Mainly from watching Storage Wars. Well Storage Treasures made that deam come true,  well most of it, I got 2 lockers cheap, didn't get lucky and find any Gold or thousand dollar items, but I found a bunch of Change, and costume jewelry. I got to start some where right.. over all I enjoyed myself and look forward to another auction!!

Review.Titre: Staff was helpful and efficient

Review.Titre: "I recently had the pleasure of using…
Review.Contenu: "I recently had the pleasure of using TreasureStorage.com for bidding and purchasing storage units, and I must say, the experience exceeded all my expectations. The website's user interface is intuitive and user-friendly, making the bidding process not only easy but genuinely enjoyable. The efficiency of the service is remarkable – winning a bid and receiving a confirmation receipt was astonishingly quick, taking only a few minutes. This level of promptness and ease adds a lot of value to the overall experience. TreasureStorage.com has definitely set a high standard for online storage auctions, and they deserve every bit of the five stars I'm giving them. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a hassle-free and swift bidding experience!"

Review.Titre: Good things all around
Review.Contenu: I utilize a few different storage locker auction sites but Storage Treasures is my top one I like. The lockers are always nicer, the pictures are always clear, and with the red and green banner letting you know if you are winning or losing makes it simpler then having to click into the post every time. I have had slight issues in the past that were cleared up on the spot with their chat feature which is super helpful. I have been told by storage facilities that calling customer service is a pain but I've never had to call. Obviously I will say paying the 15% buyer premium when you buy a locker is a burn on the wallet and I know I could buy a membership which would lower it the buyers premium but I just haven't made the jump.

Review.Titre: This is not a TV show
Review.Contenu: This is not a TV show! If you're thinking about doing this beCAREFUL There's a lot of fake units out there what you see is not exactly what you're getting.. Big Dreams Bigger nightmares! Totes filled w Christmas Halloween Easter.Jordan boxes stuffed with envelopes.Power tools with plugs cut off.Bed sets with no screws to put together.Washer and dryer that don't work.Refrigerators with old food in them. Lawn mowers always need repair they never startJUNK up to the ceilings!Very heavy furniture, sleeper couches that aren't worth anything you won't even let your dog sleep on them. Use sex toys a ton of that. Human waste yes believe it or not when people leave lockers behind they leave you a gift as well. I could go on and on and on. So basically you're cleaning out a storage locker most of the time it's what people leave behind on purpose meaning it doesn't have that much value to them. You might find something that you could use or even resell but after the expense of getting a truck guys hours of work to end up taking most of it to the dumpBe prepared for the worst keep your bidding low. Good luck 👍
